unnormalised: Okay, hakaa tumchea nirdeshanchea adharan nirmit kel'li Quora post dii:

Konnak tori maka Bhaaroti-i retail sthollant kimmati ani ankdde samzonn ghevpa vixim proxn kel'lo, mhunn chitun hanv thoddi ukto korun sangta. Hem parampara ani adunik riti hancho mell aasa, ani survaatek thoddos gollbhallicho zanv yeta. Hakaa tumkam kitem kollonk zai tem hanga diilem aasa.
normalised: Konnen-i mhaka Bharoti retail dukhanaantlea kimoti ani ankde samzun ghevnche vishayir vicharle, mhunn thodde mud'de vanttun gheunk chintlem. Hem parampara ani adhunik paddhatinchem mishrann asa, ani survek thodem gondaḷichem zaunk xakta. Tori, tumkam kitem mahit zaunk zai tem hanga asa.

unnormalised: Poili vost samzonn ghevpak Lakh ani Crore paddot. Millions ani billions visrun vocha! Bhartan, vhodd rukkum laakhm (1 lakh = 1,00,000 vo 100,000) ani croreamn (1 crore = 1,00,00,000 vo 10,000,000) ullekh kortat. Dekhik, tumi kain tori "Hi saaddi Rs. 2 Lakhs" vo "Aapttament Rs. 2.5 Crore" kimmotichi asa tumkam dista. Hea ekkamnni sookim zanvchem mukhya aasa. Ekech begaa tiip, 1 laakh mhonnllear 100 thousand ani 1 crore mhonnllear 10 million.
normalised: Pehli vost samzun gheunk zai ti mhunn'llear lakh ani crore paddhat. Million ani billion visrun vacha! Bharotaant vhodd'dea rakkmani sadharan'nepon lakh (ek lakh mhunn'llear ek lakh vo ek shat hazar) ani crore (ek crore mhunn'llear ek crore vo dha million) hakaant uktaaitaat. Mhunn'llear, tumi "He sareechi kimot rupia don lakh asa" vo "Apartmentachi kimot rupia don point panch crore asa" oxem polleunk xoktat. Hea units samgea zalea hem mahatvachem. Ek lokkh mhunn'llear ek shat hazar ani ek crore mhunn'llear dha million mhunn yaad dovrunk pauti.

unnormalised: Uprant, sankshipt rupancher loksh diiat. "Rs." mhonnllear Rupiank sadharan sankshipt rup, kednaaim tumkam "₹" dista punn "Rs." online-ar odhik sadharan. Tech porim, kimmati veglli kortat. Tumkam kain Rs. 1000 bodlek Rs 999-ank viktem dista, ek sadharan manasxastriya kimmotichi tactik. Online-ar, tumkam discount pan percentages-aant dekhik "20% off" Flipkartacher dakholl zatat. Numbr voittank vattavk dekhnnem disnachea rukkumnk chukonk nakaat. Dekhik, kimmot ₹ 799 + ₹ 49 (delivery) mhunn dakhovnk yeta.
normalised: Magir, aksharankodde dhyaan divnk zai. "Rupees" hankak "R-s." mhunn sangatat, kaim velar tumkam "rupee symbol" distolem punn online "R-s." chodd vapartat. Ani, kimoti sadharan'nepon gol korun dhakhoitat. Tumkam rupia eka hazar badle rupia nau shat nau annnuv polleunk mellunk xokta, hem ek sadharan'neponnachem manasashastrikimati ghatpachi paddhat. Online, Flipkartacher tumkam discounts dekhil sadharan'nepon "vish percent kam" mhunn dekhik mellunk xokta. Ankdeancho gol aanko vaddoitana tumkam kainch karan nasta aso dissunk mellunk xokta. Dekik, kimot rupia saat shat nau annnuv plus rupia chalis nau (delivery) oxem dakhoitelim.

unnormalised: Uprant, kimmotincher tax meloun aasa, soglle tax mellaun asa ki na mhunn loksh diivop gorjechem. Niyamitan vhodd dukanaam ani online vikrenn soglekull kimmot mellovun asta. Chapilleli kimmot kain "MRP ₹ 1200 (soglle tax mellovn)" mhunn sangta. Punn sanne dukanaam uprant tax melloun diyet. Techakhatir, diileli kimmot antim kimmot asa ki na mhunn double-check korop bore, khas korun sanne sthaapanamni vo Mumbaiantle Crawford Marketta sarkhea bazaaranni.
normalised: Magir, tax sambhandit kimoti vaprun, sogleo tax bhitor ghetlea mhunn gomun ghenchhen mahatvachem. Sadharan'nepon vhodd dukanaam ani online vhikar bhitor sagle kimoti mellteleo. Chapleli kimot "M-R-P rupia ek hazar don shat (sogleo tax vaprun)" oxem sangtelem. Punn lhan dukaana tax magir sodtale. Mhunnun, dilelea kimoti nihal kimot asa ki na tem donponn karunchim, khasponn lhan dukanaam vo Mumbaiantle Crawford Markettan polleunk zai.

unnormalised: Xevttk, seasonak laagim sale-ancher loksh diiat! Diwali sales, udahrnnank, vhodd discount asat. Discount vhodd asat ani vostuncher kimmatichi kaapnni lamb zanv yeta. Kain dukanaam 50% off vo 70% off diitat. Techakhatir utsavachia sale-ank sodat.
normalised: Nimannem, seasonal vikaracher nazar dovrunchi! Diwali vikrek, dekhik mhunn, zaitich kam kartaat. Discounts khub asaani kimati khale aasaat. Kaim dukana panchvish percent vo satvish percent kam kartaat. Mhunnun, holiday vikrek nazar dovrunchi.
